alert.note: Alert for Hansford; Ochiltree (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 10 at 9:04PM CDT until September 10 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Amarillo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Hansford County in the Panhandle of Texas... Western Ochiltree County in the Panhandle of Texas... * Until 1000 PM CDT. * At 904 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 6 miles northwest of Waka, or 9 miles north of Spearman, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect some tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Spearman, Waka, and Farnsworth. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
